question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct about Bharat Rang Mahotsav (BRM)?
  1. It is a national festival showcasing the work of the most creative theatre workers in India and does not host theatre groups from other countries
  2. It is largest theatre festival of Asia
  3. The 2019 festival pays tribute to Mahatma Gandhi
Select the correct option form the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is not correct and statement 2 is correct: Bharat Rang Mahotsav festival is organized by the National School of Drama (NSD).It was established two decades ago to stimulate the growth and development of theatre across India. Originally a national festival showcasing the work of the most creative theatre workers in India, BRM has evolved to international scope, hosting theatre groups from around the world, and is now the largest theatre festival of Asia. Statement 3 is correct: This year, the festival pays a tribute to Mahatma Gandhi, the ‘Father of the Nation’, on his 150th birth anniversary. The 20th Bharat Rang Mahotsav also hold parallel festival in other cities including Dibrugarh (Assam), Varanasi (Uttar Pradesh), Ranchi (Jharkhand), Mysore (Karnataka), and Rajkot (Gujarat).
